name: JoeyRice
wishText: 祝福荣升奔三大军的你，在按时流转的日常和手足无措的慌乱中都能稳稳建立内心的秩序，这便是我认为最好的祝福了;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: 当然也希望你能在热爱的领域保持初心和热情，面对新的挑战和冒险依旧闪闪发光！
replayText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.Or click, if you want to watch it again.
